title: Herbal Medicine
description: Discover the transformative power of herbal medicine from the comfort of your home. Gain essential herbal knowledge and formulation techniques to enhance your health naturally. Brianna Cherniak, our inspiring instructor, will take you step by step through her extensive experience and professional expertise. It's time to empower your wellbeing and unlock the healing potential of herbs.
cleaned_text: Experience the Magic of Herbalism with Brianna Cherniak Meet Brianna Cherniak, your certified herbalist and guide into the world of herbalism. Born and raised in Queens, New York, Brianna's passion for alternative medicine and herbalism fuelled her journey of study and practice. As the founder of [Moss Medicine](https://www.mossmedicine.com/), her herbal apothecary, she is dedicated to community, accessibility, and herbal education, attracting a following of over 200,000 herbal enthusiasts. With Brianna's expertise, you'll gain the confidence to delve into the study of herbalism, cultivating a solid understanding of medicinal plants, and learn how to craft your own unique remedies. Discover the transformative power of herbalism and embark on your own path of holistic healing
